text: hananim-i balam-eul bonaem-eun geu bun-ui eunhyelo bileul bonaeneun jingjola geugeos-i mugeoun guleum-eul dongbanhani geubun-eun geugeos-eul bulmojilo yudohayeogeugos-e bileul naelige hasa geugeos-eu lo modeun jonglyuui yeolmaeleul saengsanham-i la ileohdeus hananim-eun jug-eunjaleul bu hwalke hanani neohuideul-eun sang-gihalila
